name: AVMutableVideoCompositionInstruction
desc: An operation performed by a compositor.

items.name: var backgroundColor: CGColor?
items.desc: The background color of the composition.

items.name: var layerInstructions: [AVVideoCompositionLayerInstruction]
items.desc: Instructions that specify how to layer and compose video frames from source tracks.

items.name: var timeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The time range to which the instruction applies.

items.name: var enablePostProcessing: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the instruction requires post processing.

items.name: var requiredSourceSampleDataTrackIDs: [NSNumber]
items.desc: The track identifiers of source sample data that the compositor requires to compose frames for the instruction.
